name: Banana Monkey Jump HD- A Best Fun addictive dodge rocks jumping game experience
name_original: Banana Monkey Jump HD- A Best Fun addictive dodge rocks jumping game experience
description:
You and your Monkey buddy's have to jump to stay alive for as long as you can!! Tap the screen to jump and avoid the rocks. If the rocks hit you, you and your Monkey buddy die. Don’t let the rocks crush you!!
Double IQ level game
Use two fingers and one Mind
Features:

-Share your scores with game centre

-Simple controls

-Easy to play

-Very addicting

Download now!!
